discussion.p: The conversion constructor of take_while_view::sentinel requires sentinel_t<V> must satisfy convertible_to<sentinel_t<Base>>, which indicates that the rvalue reference of sentinel_t<V> can be converted to sentinel_t<Base>, but in the Effects element, we assign the lvalue s.end_ to end_.
Set status to Tentatively Ready after seven votes in favour during reflector poll.

blockquote.pre: constexpr sentinel(sentinel<!Const> s) requires Const && convertible_to<sentinel_t<V>, sentinel_t<Base>>;

blockquote.p: -2- Effects: Initializes end_ with std::move(s.end_) and pred_ with s.pred_.
